law.text:
A meeting of a public agency may be adjourned and reconvened at some other time without additional public notice provided:
Notice of the time and place of the reconvened meeting is given before adjournment;
The agenda for the reconvened meeting shall be published in advance; and
That the agenda is available to observers of the original meeting at its commencement.
